title: Mariusz Błaszczak
summary:
Mariusz Błaszczak [ˈmarʲjuʂ ˈbwaʂt͡ʂak] (listen) (born 19 September 1969, in Legionowo) is a Polish politician, historian, and local government representative. Since 9 January 2018, Blaszczak has been the Minister of National Defence of Poland. 
On 22 June 2022 President Andrzej Duda nominated Błaszczak to succeed Jarosław Kaczyński as the Deputy Prime Minister of Poland.
